cmd.cites.cmd.second.line.cite: Thorburn, Law of Confidential Business Information ยง 1:8

prop.head.headtext: Thorburn, Law of Confidential Business Information

prop.head.label.name: Chapter
prop.head.headtext: Confidential Business Information in Historical Context

para.paratext: Intellectual property includes patents, copyright, trade-marks, industrial designs, personality rights, trade secrets, and confidential information, and intellectual property legislation regulates the exploitation of some of these ideas, creations and information. Rights to intellectual property may be owned, inherited, transferred, taxed, or become subject to security interest, a trust or bankruptcy.
